text:
The mailing list browser mode does not appear to work at all in Opera (11.51/1087/WinXP); Opera always switches to flat view.

It always seems to work in Chrome (14.0.835.202) (at least, I've not found any boxes that don't work)

It does not always work in Firefox (7.0.1) - for some mailboxes - e.g. 

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/incubator-ooo-dev/201110.mbox/browser

the message list view comes up empty; it is OK when switched to flat view.

Yet an earlier mailbox from the same project:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/incubator-ooo-dev/201107.mbox/browser

works OK in Firefox. July is the only one that works for me from that list.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: Something has changed, because Firefox (still using 7.0.1) can now access all the months in browse mode.
creator: sebb@apache.org
